attributes.review: I got the app and immediately it ask for my address, phone number, etc.  Sir you are married. Anyways after filling it all out he appears at my door and kidnaps me, takes me to a restaurant and than keeps me in a basement.  He than brings one of my friends and one of my dogs for “entertainment” he says I have to marry him and sell my soul to the devil, also vote for him and than he will let my parents go which he also held hostage. If not we would be killed.  Luckily I was able to help us escape, I also saved my family.  100% do not recommend but at least me and my family . Anyways Trump, I do not want to marry you💖🌈💫
attributes.title: HORRID💫🌈💖

attributes.review: I downloaded because I really wanted content and rallies and whatever else trump is doing because to be real with you, I don’t know much of what he’s doing and campaigning for but like I just wanted to know. But NOOOOO, this app has serious issues that is just crazy to me. I opened it up and it had glitches. My phone immediately went to a black screen and then when I got it to turn on my camera had like a weird light in it. I think someone is watching me like no joke. So I quickly uninstalled and I don’t recommend getting this app. It probably gave my phone a virus and now I have to get a new one. Thanks trump 🙄🙄
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: I don’t support rapists, sexists, racists, and all around prejudice people. You can’t argue with me that he isn’t a terrible person, there is proof he has raped multiple little girls. He has said in the past that he is more sexually attracted to his own daughter than his wife, he has made jokes about his being a predator, and much more gross things. You guys people wanna say, “what will we do about rapists without the police force?” Don’t make them our president love. I would also like to like to mention that if his hair was real and attached to his scalp, he would 100% have lice. All I have to say in the end is that’s he’s a stinky dude. #freebarrontrump❤️
attributes.title: Stinky

attributes.review:
I don’t even know where to begin my review because the truth is that I have been violated in multiple ways. Through my constitutional rights to being a human being in a free country. To allowing myself the opportunity to live in solace. To not being scared of the world while an overgrown puppet throws his way around in the White House.

This app has a significant number of flaws! The first one is that it is very, very slow. 

The second problem with the app, is that it’s not current and up-to-date on the worlds problems. 

The third problem is that it is draining me. It is extremely taxing! Sometimes, emotionally debilitating. 

And finally, the last problem! It’s not accepting of all of its users! It only works for a small percentage of people who fit into its mold. 

It would be 1000% better if the app wore a mask! But given the fact that it’s on so many antibiotics for its STD’s, it probably doesn’t believe it needs to be wearing a mask, anymore.
attributes.title: I Was Violated

attributes.title: 똥

attributes.review: I cannot with you Donny! This app is causing me to break out!! Every time I try to get on it glitches and when I call customer support they take 2hrs to get back to me!!! I’m a hard working class citizen who loves you but this app makes me hate you. I want to speak to your manager trump!! Also this app caused my phone to heat up exponentially! Worst experience ever! Learn from Markus Zuckening who runs FB! Also u should add my friend Linda Barnes she hates you! She says you’re a horrible leader and I agree but you’re toupee just amazes me! I should put #TrumpsToupee2020! Also would you like to try my casserole dish 😂 it’s better than Linda’s.
attributes.title: Unbelievably horrible

attributes.review: I first opened this app expecting a very professional feel but was astonished when I saw a bright orange man nude as the first image to pop up......🤯😤😵🙄🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮My boyfriend looked over and saw the picture, he thought I was texting another man!!!!😱I tried to explain to him I didn’t know or have relations with the OBESE CHEETO MAN BUT HE DID NOT LISTEN!!! He broke up with me all because of stupid worthless app no one should ever download. It cost me the love of my life and I will not stop until I seek revenge!!!😡😡😡😡🤚🏻🔪🔪🔪🔪🔪🔪🔪🔪🔪🔪. On a lighter note, I would highly recommend the Tik Tok app.  It is very educational and you can learn tons.
attributes.title: Would not recommend this app to my worst enemy......

attributes.review: I downloaded this for my parents since they are big fans of President Trump. After downloading, they both had their front facing cameras turn on several times without them accessing the cameras themselves. I didn’t believe it at first but then I took the devices to my husband’s office because he is a professional hacker hired by banks to test their digital security systems. He checked their phones and iPads and sure enough, this app scrapes data from your phone, turns on your cameras and your mics without your knowledge. When we tried to delete the app, all 4 devices crashed.
attributes.title: Accessed private data on your device

attributes.review: so i downloaded this to see papi trump🥰💕 and it told me i HAD TO SUBSCRIBE and of course i did yo see papi trump 😝 and then POOF a fairy pops up in my room!! turns out to be TINKER BELL WITH ONLY A TRUMP FLAG COVER HER BOOSUM AND TATAS!!😍 we danced and partied while we talking about papi trump 🥵 and SUDDENLY there was a KNOCK at my window 😱 IT WAS PETER PAN!! he yelled at me and told me if i was hiding tinker bell he’d KILL MY KITTY!!(both of them;) 😫 i got tinker bell and he CHOPPED HER HEAD OFF!😓 he came out of his trance and told me papi trump FORCED HIM TOO😭😭 all because of this app😭 so now peter and living with me and tinker bells dead body is on my bedroom floor😨 if you download this app your kitty’s will die and peter pan will kill the tooth fairy 🧚‍♀️ ✨ dont be the person to kill the tooth fairy 😔
